transitdroid.domain.entities.mobiledevice

Class PhoneOutputMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • transitdroid.domain.core.BaseOutputMapper<Phone>
      • transitdroid.domain.entities.mobiledevice.MobileDeviceOutputMapper

  • public class PhoneOutputMapper
extends BaseOutputMapper<Phone>
    Author:
    TransitDroid Team PhoneOutputMapper will act as a gate which outputs data from the domain layer to the data source. It outputs data from Phone DomainObjects to the data source PhoneTOG. PhoneOutputMapper is located in the Domain Layer of the Application. It communicates directly with its corresponding TableOutputGateway i.e PhoneTOG. The PhoneOutputMapper contains insert, update and remove methods. A user of this class can insert a Phone object, Update a Phone Object, or remove a Phone object. The PhoneOutputMapper's methods delegate the work and functionality to their corresponding static methods in the PhoneTOG. This class insures separation of concerns and produce cleaner code. This makes sure that SQL statements of the type "insert", "update", and "delete" i.e remove are kept separate in the data source layer.

      boolean update(Phone phone)
      passes a Phone DomainObject to PhoneTOG which updates it in the database.
